嫶字的基本解释

嫶
qiáo
〔嫶妍（
y俷 ）〕因忧伤而消瘦，如“嫶嫶太息，叹稚子兮。”

嫶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáo］
［《集韻》慈焦切，平宵，從。］
见“嫶妍”。
[②]［jiāo］
［《集韻》兹消切，平宵，精。］
人名用字。

嫶字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫶； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页270第38
【集韻】慈焦切【正韻】慈消切。?同憔。【前漢·外戚傳】嫶姸太息。【註】晉灼曰：三輔謂憂愁面省疲曰嫶冥，嫶姸猶嫶冥也。　又【集韻】兹消切，音焦。女字。　顦癄醮焦蕉?通。

嫶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嫶字的起名意思

暂无。

嫶
Basic explanation of words
嫶
qiáo
〔嫶yan (
y 俷)] Lose weight due to sorrow, such as "My wife is too sigh, I sigh immature."
嫶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiáo］
["Jiyun" is kind and jiaoqie, flat night, from. ]
See "嫶 Yan".
[②]［jiāo］
["Ji Yun" is hereby cut, flat night, fine. ]
Use characters for names.
嫶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫶; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 270-38
[Ji Yun] Compassionate Jiao Qi [Zheng Yun] Compassionate reduction and cutting. ? The same. [Previous Han·Foreign Biography] Concubine Taixi. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Sanfu said that he said that he was sad and tired, and he said that he was still alive.　 [Ji Yun] Now cut and cut, the sound is focused. Female characters.　顦癄醮jiao banana? Pass.
